      • getDoubleSizeChineseCharctor

        public SettingEnum getDoubleSizeChineseCharctor()

      • setDoubleSizeChineseCharctor

        @Deprecated
public void setDoubleSizeChineseCharctor(SettingEnum doubleSizeChineseCharctor)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated, No Working[已弃用，无效]
        For Pin
        设定/撤消 4 倍角汉字
        4 倍角字为原字的纵横放大一倍。若同一行内字型高度不一致时，字符会字底对齐。
        Chinese charactor setting
        Parameters:
        doubleSizeChineseCharctor - accepted value: CommonEnum.Setting.Enable/CommonEnum.Setting.Disable

        public void setIsEscSmallCharactor(SettingEnum isEscSmallCharactor)
        For ESC
        是否设置小字体[适用于Esc]
        small charactor setting
        Parameters:
        isEscSmallCharactor - SettingEnum.Enable = 小字体生效(small font,Font-B )， SettingEnum.Disable = 撤销小字体设置(Normal font,Font-A)

      • getZplFontTypeEnum

        public ZplFontTypeEnum getZplFontTypeEnum()

      • setZplFontTypeEnum

        public void setZplFontTypeEnum(ZplFontTypeEnum zplFontTypeEnum)
        For Zpl, Font type Setting
        Zpl文本字体设置
        Parameters:
        zplFontTypeEnum - 0=Vector font (downloadable font),Other resident fonts:A~G,1~9
        0=矢量字体(下载的字体)，其他常驻字体：A~G ，1~9

      • getZplWidthFactor

        public int getZplWidthFactor()

      • setZplWidthFactor

        public void setZplWidthFactor(int zplWidthFactor)
        For Zpl
        width factor setting
        字体宽度设置
        Parameters:
        zplWidthFactor -
        接受的值 accept value:
        矢量字体 Vector font(FONT_DOWNLOAD_FONT): 10~32000,
        点阵字体 Dot matrix font(Font A~G, 1~9): 1~10

        Font Type Setting, Only support English-Number charactor
        ESC字体设置,适用于ESC便携打印机，仅支持英数字体
        Parameters:

        FONT_D_8x16
